text: but my brain doesnt let me. If anyone reading this with the same condition, please tell me how to deal with this brain which is full of noise and clutter. Remember I have no money to spend on doctors. Thank you in advance. #Adhd

living like a corpse while everyone else living their lives. When I tell family about it, they treat it as an excuse to cover up failure so no help there. #adhdtwitter why is it so hard to be normal like everyone else? I just wanna focus on my interests and my life

You know it's kinda ironic after noticing that I have adhd after a life full of failures, failed relationships, depression, anxiety, suicide attempts. Now I have no money or job to get a treatment or focus on improving(yea funny.) I don't know how long I can continue #ADHD
my first proper apple. I started my art journey a few months back. I'm gonna share everything I do here to see my progress. #art https://t.co/BgvkxjJ5sm
